controls.label: Have you identified and documented the ML/TF risk factors relevant to your business as required by Rule 4.1.3?
controls.detail-label: Describe your ML/TF risk identification process and the factors you have assessed.

controls.label: Have you assessed customer types (including beneficial owners and PEPs) as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
Have you assessed customers' sources of funds and wealth as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
Have you assessed the nature and purpose of business relationships with customers as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you collect and assess information about the nature and purpose of customer relationships.

controls.label: Have you assessed the control structure of non-individual customers as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
Have you assessed the types of designated services you provide as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
Have you assessed the methods by which you deliver designated services as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
Have you assessed the foreign jurisdictions with which you deal as part of your ML/TF risk identification?
If you have customers who became customers after 1 June 2014, have you applied the enhanced requirements for beneficial owners (Part 4.12) and PEPs (Part 4.13) to those customers?
controls.detail-label: Describe how you determine customer commencement dates and apply enhanced requirements to post-1 June 2014 customers.

groups.title: ML/TF Risk Identification Factors
groups.description: Assessment of the key risk factors a reporting entity must consider when identifying, managing and mitigating money laundering or terrorism financing risk.

groups.title: Application of Enhanced Requirements
groups.description: Special application rules for customers acquired after transition dates and the applicability of enhanced due diligence requirements.
